Blog.post: Every breath you take Every move you make Every bond you break Every step you take I'll be watching you Every single day Every word you say Every game you play Every night you stay I'll be watching you O can't you see You belong to me How my poor heart aches with every step you take Every move you make Every vow you break Every smile you fake Every claim you stake I'll be watching you Since you've gone I been lost without a trace I dream at night I can only see your face I look around but it's you I can't replace I keep crying baby please Every move you make Every vow you break Every smile you fake Every claim you stake I'll be watching you

I've been thinkin bout yesterdae...i talked to muh homie pimp ova tha phone yest afta i msged gd nyt to Y...mayb i'm too fast to jump to conclusions..dat's whut muh homie pimp said..he said i only know Y fer lyk bout two months..and i'm alwayz assumin thiz that..assumin that she doesn't know real/harsh lyf..assumin that she wuz angry at me when i failed to meet her up..diz isn't how i'm supposed to take things.."if you're feelin unclear..talk to her..straighten thingz out and fuck history...don't care whut that playa(he's not even fit to be a playa but a GAYBOY) fren of yrs think..he's jus lucky..tha reason history repeatz itself is because ya made tha same mistake ova and ova again..why both failed iz becos ya didn't take time and balls to straighten thingz out wit them..so if ya want Y really badly n ya wantz thangz to be lyk norm..choose yr tym and try to call her..straighten thangs out wit her and talk thingz..whutchu really feel..fuck whut dat GAYBOY thinks..he won't take her from ya...trust me...he's jus playin around..so whut ya gotta do now iz ta try and call her!!..ask her how's thangz..ask her if she got any problem..so on and so forth..make it up to her..ight.."afta whut he said...i tink i haf some explainin to do..i bet she probably read muh bloggie..and god knows whut she feels..i tink i'll end it here now..lata then..till then..i'll find muh ballz and go talk to her..thankz Pimp..he's one gd fren of mine..
haha..i forgot to add in i climbed 4734ft...and went down anotha 4734 ft..both of which halfway i carried that idiotic heavy full pack...urgh...causin me back pain...signin off now..haha..

Yeah...i'm back now everyone...seems everyone is ouhkay..i guess..tha trip wuz great...but daayuuum tirin...i conquered tha summit!yeah!neva tot i could do it.. haha..from tha foot of tha hill to tha campsite took 6 daayuum loonngg houuurz... urgh...but it wuz worth it..we pitched up tentz den muh homies all jumped into the waterfall...woo!! brr...so daayuum cold..afta that we had lotsa fun..but so much fer tha campfire...all ate den go to sleep...urgh...nvm..i wuz tired too..when i wuz up there..i tot i'm gonna miss Y a lot..but i really don't..i juz dunno why..nvm...back to the trip..next day...all woke up late..haha....den all had a quick shower..afta that...climbed all tha way to tha summit...from 9 to 2...woo...tired man...the summit's view wuz amazing...cloudz...so cool and so....dunno how ta explain it..haha..before we knew it..we wuz goin down..urgh..not enuff!!haha..i made frens wit malyanah and diana..haha...cool gurlz tho..sweet...umm..cannot judge them too fast..they didn't give me chance to go fasta than them...i don't know why..mayb becoz i wuz singin awae nycely..haha.. Ya right..ya didn't even sing..den by tha tym we reached back ta camp..it wuz bout 6 plus..so we had a quick bath..den all had dinner..one of muh homie roy wuz buzily chattin to one of da gurlz in their tent..so M and D had to get out..haha..poor thang..so both of de gurlz seeked refuge at our tent..muh groupie..dream team tent..haha..since ourz wuz big and had lights on top..thankz ta me..haha..i suddenly fell sick..so i lied on muh bag and started playing cardz wit the gurlz and guyz..we had a longgg game..den i wuz so layz dat i stopped playin and began listenin to songz on muh discman wit malyanah..she wuz still playin even tho it wuz already dunno whut tym....ahakz...i'm really layz to tell tha rest of wud happen..hahah(NEXT TYM YAR)...back to Y...i nv bought fer her anythin since we nv went to melaka..stoopid bus driver..nv got to ate a&w!!!haha..nvm..i wuz too tired..when i reached home...it wuz already 10 at nyt..wanted to contact Y..but nvm..heeded A's advice..i already feel i'm buggin Y and not givin her freedom and borin her ta death..it'z not muh fault if she starts to contact wit otha guyz...urgh..whut am i to do mann...she'z not muh gurl..saw her online juz now..she nv said hi..so i kept quiet..yest i called her...she said she wuz bout ta sleep..wanted to call me lata but didnt'..nvm..she's too tyred mayb..todae..didn't got a msg at all..nvm..it's a norm...i alwaes hafta msg her b4 she replies..it's a norm too..i've been thinkin whut norman said.."she's not tha one fer ya..trust me.."that's whut he said bout farah and that biatch too...is he bein lucky or is he gonna hit that jackpot thrice..we'll see soon enuf..i don't want him to get tha jackpot again..don't wanna lose Y..she's whut i'm waitin fer...cept fer her bein mean to me...i don't mind..it's who she is..i hafta accept her fer whu she is...and i lyk her fer whu she is..not fer her lookz,her sweetness and all...urgh!!!...forget bout all diz man...just don't worry and be happy...come on boy...dun't be a wimp..and be a pimp!don't let a girl pull ya down..if she's tha one..she won't run awae..if not..den too bad..if she nv msg ya fer a few dayz meanz she wanna be alone..if it's fer weekz den ya hafta worry bout it..haha..i still can joke when i'm in deeeeeep shiiiit...i gotta trust Y a lot from now on..since i can see there's a storm ahead..not gonna call her dearie again..it's too fast..she doesn't deserve it now..mayb lata..since she calls me fren..if she means whut she said dat she lyks me..den one day feelingz will flow and flourish..i must stop dependin on her lyk as if she's muh lyflyne..Y's alwayz sayin i'm drama-mama(her term)..she hasn't experienced lyf's real harsh reality..apart from breakupz and so on..ARGHH...stop it!!!..enuff wit diz already...."ya gotta take diz cool"..even tho A said it sooner..thanks ya..juz wanna say "Thanks to all who prayed fer muh safety up and down the hill..(not any hill kay..gunung ledang ya noe..haha..)..thankz to A..no idea why..thanks to Y...still no idea why..i still haf dat urge to reach fer muh hp and type hi to Y...but no..COBAAN!!haha..i'll tink i end it here now...lata then..

ARGGHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!! Yesterdae wuz a very bad day fer me...had lotsa thangz goin on thru muh mind... firstly...i'm sowie fer all tha thangz i did...to think everyone sayz that i'm sensitive..sensitive or not sensitive..they don't know whut's goin on thru muh mind ryt now...muh brotha is still on muh mind..fresh as eva...some ppl think dat i'm bein sad bout whut i did to Y...it's not only dat..it's more bout muh brotha..i wuz already sad yesterdae..before i bugged her out so that i could meeet her..whut wuz i thinkin dawg..i don't blame her fer bein mad at me...i know i'm an idiot..where'z de luv..i feel lyk joinin muh brotha sumtyms..tearz already dry..no matter even how hard i try..cos it's so hard to sae good bye..to tha one i luv most..to tha one i lost.In the future, can't wait to see..If you open up the gates for me..Reminisce some time, the night they took my brotha..Try to black it out, but it plays again..When it's real, feelings hard to conceal..Can't imagine all the pain I feel..Give anything to hear half your breath..I know you still living your life, after death..I miss you Bro..It's kinda hard with you not around..Know you in heaven smilin down..Watchin us while we pray for you..Every day we pray for you..Til the day we meet again..In my heart is where I'll keep you bro..Memories give me the strength I need to proceed..Strength I need to believe..My thoughts Bro..I just can't define..Wish I could turn back the hands of time.. Secondly.. didn't know that A could be so mean(don't blame her)...to think she said "why wuz you even born?"..i know she doesn't mean it..but it's true...when someone is mad at cha...they speak their mind...i wuz so startled by that comment..startled cos even tho i wuz told dat a lotta tymes by otha ppl...i didn't expect it to come from A..tears almost flowed..but i held back..why should i let muh tearz flow..tears iz only fer tha one i luv..so whut if i'm sensitive..accept me for whu i am..not fer whu i'm tryin to be..i couldn't sleep yesterdae cos of that..in bout a few hours..i'm off for muh trip..back to yesterdae..i didn't keep muh promise of meeting Y at somerset yesterdae cos muh homie needed to buy campin stuff and he didn't noe at where..i wuz bout to board the bus on tha way to meet Y..when he said he wuz reachin..i wuz in a dilemma..A told me she felt hurt dat i didn't keep muh promise..but whut could i do..i am to be blamed afta all...i'll guess i'll just end it off here..to Y...i'm sowie..sowie may seem cheap but i really mean it now..to A..i don't blame ya...sowie if you wuz fed up coz of me..didn't really mean to..I'm signin off...

Last Saturdae wuz a bomb!..Had A Supa Great Tym with muh homeboys and girls..even tho there wuz only five ppl..haha..started off saturdae by not reportin fer Sportz Dae..haha...poor thang muh homies called me lyk nutz..i wuz dozin off..haha..woke up at 11..wit lotsa missed calls...haha..den i took a bath...while muh boombox wuz blazin Usher-I Want Ya Back (throwback remix) feat Jadakiss...afta that..went to have muh breakfast..i called up muh homie Pimp..had ta meet him at chinatown at 1..or is it 2..hehe..i don't know...i got ready..den i started callin M..D..R..muh homie rizz couldn't make it..he had ta go to sch..haha..poor thang..den i met up wit Pimp...checked out blingz watchez at People's Park...haha..den we took 190 to town ta meet LIL MIE!!long tym neva meet muh homie..as it turned out..he secretly asked out muh homegal Ili..hehe..nv tell me uh..haha..nvm..anyway..we went walkin around town till it wuz 5 when D msged me dat she arrived already..we went ta meet her at tangs entrance.. den we walked around lucky plaza..when i called M..hehe..she already passed Lucky Plaza when i called her..got a scoldin..gee..fuhnee anywae..we went up ta eat..but too many ppl..den headed to CAHAYA...urgh...muh homiez Pimp and Lil Mie didn't want ta eat there...ARGH..again missed eatin char kway..haizz...den we went lido..tot muh best fren wuz still there..but he went off already..nvm..Roy already arrived..den M,D,R went up ta Long John ta eat..i chilled wit dem lata afta i chilled wit Pimp and Lil Mie..den i rushed up ta Long John..haha..lyk some stoopid idiot..afta eatin...we went ta cineleisure..by dat tym..Ira arrived..wit tha 45 DEGREEZ UP stucked up fren..head so high..so snobbish..urgh..ppl smile but de face look lyk not happee..whut de Fcuk...anywae..we went up ta take neoprintz!(OH MY GOSH!!)forced dawg..haha..paid 2 bucks and ended up wit two small stickaz..haha..nvm..wuz worth de fun..next tym wanna take pic only wit M!!..haha..den we walked around b4 headin home..send dem all to de mrt..den sent home M to tha buz stop..(wished had sent her home till her doorstep)but tym didn't allow me to..by tha minute..I'm fallin fer her...haha..(if i wuz muh bez fren..i wud have taken her a long tym ago...one of tha bez catches in de world..if not..de bez..)imagine havin a Laydee lyk that iz madly in luve witchu...woo!on top of diz wurld munn..newae..i wonda if M iz eva gonna stop chasin muh best fren..haiz...Lyf's weird man...He has a daayuum gurl chasin her..but he iz kinda ?????..i can't tell...diz too deep fer me ta tell anyone..diz fridae..mayb gonna watch movie..we'll see how yar..am gonna blog bout whut's really on muh mind ryt now..fer now...Ight..Peace..I Still miss de company of Y...

it wuz a pretty ordinary sundae..lyf wus norm as usual..i woke up wit muh baby nephew smackin me on tha face..i switched on muh hp..it wuz normal..nobody msgin me..haha..whu's gonna msg me ryt in the mornin..den when i put it down..and muh baby nephew wuz playin wit it..muh hp suddenly played Get Low..muh msg ring tone..i looked to check whu wuz it..of all ppl...it had to be her..F..whut did she want now..she wrote bout wantin ta meet me and all..and i wuz lyk...wud de hell now..den i wrote to her back.."mayb i'll meet ya ight..afta i go fer muh soccer trainin.."den she msg back sayin ouhkae..afta that...did muh usual stuffs..i msged Y to say hi..den afta that i played muh games and all..had breakfast..slouched on tha sofa..den b4 i knew it..it wuz tym fer trainin..on tha bus..she msged me yet again..den i told her i wud finish at 7...she said ight..i had trainin and all...laughed here and there..lyf wuz beginnin to look more bright..even tho it wuz already 7.. I DIDN'T KNOW IT WUZ GONNA BE WURSE LATA... i walked muh wae to tha bus stop from tha trainin ground..called her bout countless tyms..but she nv picked it up..and i wuz beginnin to get irritated..arghh....FCUK man...i'm sick of tellin already...i dun wanna be reminded of whut's next...F Her(F)..you come into muh lyf..make me wait lyk a dog..den afta that tryna get shuweet wif me all of a sudden..callin me baby...blablablabla..den afta that leave muh lyf...I hate thiz kinda ppl...worse of all..She still could have da cheek to sae that she rather have many guy frenz den get into all diz mushy stuff..when she wuz tha one whu started it first..DAAAAYUUUUUUMMMM... I'm out!

Baby baby baby baby baby baby baby baby baby baby baby... im so glad... I will never find another lova sweeter than you Sweeter than you And I will never find another lova more precious than you More precious than you Girl you are Close to me you're like my mother Close to me you're like my father Close to me you're like my sister Close to me you're like my brother You are the only one in my everything and for you this song I sing And for all my life I've prayed for someone like you And I thank God that I, that I finally found you For all my life I've prayed for someone like you And I hope that you feel the same way too Yes, I pray that you do love me too I said you're all that I'm thinkin' of nananananana...baby..nananana Said, I promise to never fall in love with a stranger You're all I'm thinkin' of, I praise the Lord above For sending me your love, I cherish every hug I really love you! And for all my life (baby, baby) I've prayed for someone like you, And I thank God (thannkkk God!) that I, that I finally found you, For all my life I've prayed for someone like you And I hope that you feel the same way too Yes, I pray that you do love me too You're all that I ever known When you smile, on my face, all I see is a glow You turned my life around You picked me up when I was down You're all that I ever known When you smile my face glows You picked me up when I was down You're all that I ever known When you smile my face glows You picked me up when I was down And I hope that you feel the same way toooooo Yes I pray that you do love me too For all my life I've prayed for someone like you And I thank God that I, that I finally found you For all my life I've prayed for someone like you Yes, I pray that you do love me tooooo For all my life I've prayed for someone like you And I thank God that I, that I finally found you For all my life I've prayed for someone like you Yes, I pray that you do love me tooooo For all my life I've prayed for someone like you And I thank God that I finally found you...
